plot outline: Set in the rural Rajasthan in India in the backdrop of village council elections, Kasaai is a political drama that meanders around the struggle of a mother Gulabi to get justice for her 18 year old son who gets killed by his impulsive father in a fit of rage. Her helplessness grows when the family, looking for another term in the council elections, tries to cover up the crime under the garb of a concocted story as their political fortunes fluctuate. As she struggles with her inner turmoil, an unexpected turn of event brings a ray of hope for her as it also turns the table for the family, but will it be a win win end?
title: Kasaai
plot: A mother struggles to get justice for her son who gets killed under unusual circumstances as the family tries to cover up the crime in the backdrop of impending village council elections.

Set in the rural Rajasthan in India in the backdrop of village council elections, _Kasaai_ (qv) is a political drama that meanders around the struggle of a mother Gulabi to get justice for her 18 year old son who gets killed by his impulsive father in a fit of rage. Her helplessness grows when the family, looking for another term in the council elections, tries to cover up the crime under the garb of a concocted story as their political fortunes fluctuate. As she struggles with her inner turmoil, an unexpected turn of event brings a ray of hope for her as it also turns the table for the family, but will it be a win win end?::Gajendra Shrotriya
